page.title: 05Roadways A36/A303
page.content: There is a main road going through the Wylye Valley, it is the A36 which goes from Southampton to Bristol and they are both busy ports.The road goes through Steeple Langford.In half an hour 27 vans, 74 lorries, 1 motor bike and 225 cars went through the village. The village of Wylye was on the A303 but was bypassed in 1975.Now there is not so much noise and dirt. A shop , a pub and a garage had to close down.In the same half an hour in Wylye we counted 0 motorbikes 31 cars 9 vans and 8 lorries passing through Wylye Village. We hope Steeple Langford will be bypassed by 1990. {
